item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, May 21, 2024 at 4:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. One dead and dozens injured after turbulence hits London to Singapore flight
2. [Opinion] A crushing blow for Israel and a massive gamble by the ICC
3. How sanctions played havoc with Iran’s ageing helicopters
4. Scarlett Johansson hits out at ‘eerily similar’ OpenAI chatbot voice
5. ICC arrest warrants move sparks fierce reaction from Israel and White House
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, May 21, 2024 at 4:15 PM UTC
